chapter.title: Backup and Restore
chapter.para: This page allows you to back up the data for &hpecloudsys; appliances, restore from the backup file, and recover the Database appliance data.

listitem.para: Back up (full and incremental) the data (databases and files) for the trios of &hpecloudsys; appliances.
Restore from the backup file the data for the trios of &hpecloudsys; appliances.
Recover the Database appliance data after the restore.

important.para: Before you start your first backup, you must use the Attis CLI to specify where &hpecloudsys; will store backup files.
